name: Hero's path (Dottypix, artemiscg)
description:
Your city is under attack and you must provide for the heros!

Take all the things they need and put them in the bag, then sell it to the correct hero. But be careful!

Nobody will wait for all eternity, and surely not with those terrible monsters around.
Beware of their fears, as the heros will even flee if you're too late.
